name: Match - 3 Family Cake Cafe
description:
Fruit cupcakes, Viennese wafers, fruits and fresh juice, chocolate chips, candy jam, fresh cookies and a funny raccoon are waiting for you in this ""match three"" game!

Elly and her friend Monty making the best bakery in the world. But nobody knows it yet!

Now our heroes have their own mobile cafe and hurry to begin their journey. Take part in amazing adventure with funny candy-girl Elly and her friend Monty the raccoon.

Treat the guests with most delicious sweets, learn best recipes, and find new friends. Entertaining tasks, yummy chips, 90 fresh-cooked levels, funny characters and unexpected adventures are waiting for you!

Travel with Elly through sweet levels. Match cakes in raw to complete orders. Match more cakes to get super-cakes with super-effects!

Treats with baking all visitors: an old farmer, a gardens worker, a little boy Austin, a burgess and an owner of the mansion. Travel the world, reach CA and then Asgardan! Become a king of match 3!

Beat levels, collect the stars and compete with your friends. These delicious tasks won't let anybody get bored, give most pleasant emotions, and become great leisure for entire family.

This is a great game for plane. You can scape from the city bustle and open your own cafe. Cook delicious cupcakes in your mobile instead of like a panda jam bamboo with boredom.

What is waiting for you in this game:
*Juicy graphics and appetizing bakery!
*Free boosters will surprize you! *Powerful effects!
*We have a raccoon!
*Amazing journey!
*Memorable characters and visitors!
*Amusing mechanics: trays, wafers, conveyors, and much more!
*Delicious boosters and bonuses!
*Match 3!

We on facebook https://www.facebook.com/8FloorGames/
